page.title: 01General Review of Area.
page.content: Our area is situated on the east coast of the Borough of Sunderland,immediately to the south of the River Wear.Almost 2/3rds. of the area to the east is covered by the North Sea.The western quarter of the block is largely taken up by the residential housing of varying types and age.Two railway lines run through the area.One is the main Teeside-Tyneside line and the other is a branch from Ryhope Grange Junction to the Docks.This latter line is used almost entirely to transport coalfrom local pits to the docks for transhipment to power stations on the River Thames.The Docks are used much less than in their heyday,but still provide a source of employment in an area of very high unemployment.
